00042 #ifndef _keyer_h
00043 #define _keyer_h
00044 
00045 #include <fromsys.h>
00046 #include <banal.h>
00047 #include <splitfields.h>
00048 #include <datatypes.h>
00049 
00050 //========================================================================
00051 
00052 #define DSR_LINE_CLOSED_KEY      (1)
00053 #define CTS_LINE_CLOSED_KEY      (1)
00054 #define DTR_LINE_SET             (0)
00055 #define RTS_LINE_SET             (0)
00056 
00057 #define NO_TIMEOUTS_SCHED       (-2)
00058 #define NO_ELEMENT              (-1)
00059 #define DIT                      (0)
00060 #define DAH                      (1)
00061 #define MODE_A                   (0)
00062 #define MODE_B                   (1)
00063 #define NO_PADDLE_SQUEEZE        (0)
00064 #define PADDLES_SQUEEZED         (1)
00065 #define PADDLES_RELEASED         (2)
00066 #define NO_DELAY                 (0)
00067 #define CHAR_SPACING_DELAY       (1)
00068 #define WORD_SPACING_DELAY       (2)
00069 #define DEBOUNCE_BUF_MAX_SIZE   (30)
00070 
00071 //========================================================================
00072 
00073 typedef struct _keyer_state
00074 {
00075 
00076     struct
00077     {
00078 
00079         BOOLEAN iambic,         // iambic or straight
00080                 mdlmdB,
00081                 revpdl;         // paddles reversed
00082 
00083         struct
00084         {
00085             BOOLEAN dit,
00086                     dah;
00087         } memory;
00088 
00089         struct
00090         {
00091             BOOLEAN khar,
00092                     word;
00093         } autospace;
00094 
00095     } flag;
00096 
00097     int debounce,               // # seconds to read paddles
00098         mode,                   // 0 = mode A, 1 = mode B
00099         weight;                 // 15 -> 85%
00100 
00101     REAL wpm;                   // for iambic keyer
00102 
00103 } KeyerStateInfo, *KeyerState;
00104 
00105 extern KeyerState newKeyerState( void );
00106 extern void delKeyerState( KeyerState ks );
00107 
00108 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 
00110 typedef struct _keyer_logic
00111 {
00112 
00113     struct
00114     {
00115         BOOLEAN init;
00116 
00117         struct
00118         {
00119             BOOLEAN dit,
00120                     dah;
00121         } prev;
00122 
00123     } flag;
00124 
00125     struct
00126     {
00127         BOOLEAN invtd,          // insert inverted element
00128                 psqam;          // paddles squeezed after mid-element
00129         int curr,               // -1 = nothing, 0 = dit, 1 = dah
00130             iamb,               //  0 = none, 1 = squeezed, 2 = released
00131             last;               // -1 = nothing, 0 = dit, 1 = dah
00132     } element;
00133 
00134     struct
00135     {
00136         REAL beep,
00137              dlay,
00138              elem,
00139              midl;
00140     } timeout;
00141 
00142     int dlay_type;              // 0 = none, 1 = interchar, 2 = interword
00143 
00144 } KeyerLogicInfo, *KeyerLogic;
00145 
00146 extern KeyerLogic newKeyerLogic( void );
00147 extern void delKeyerLogic( KeyerLogic kl );
00148 
00149 //========================================================================
00150 
00151 extern BOOLEAN klogic( KeyerLogic kl, BOOLEAN dit, BOOLEAN dah, REAL wpm,
00152                        int iambicmode, BOOLEAN midelementmodeB,
00153                        BOOLEAN ditmemory, BOOLEAN dahmemory,
00154                        BOOLEAN autocharspacing, BOOLEAN autowordspacing,
00155                        int weight, REAL ticklen );
00156 
00157 extern BOOLEAN read_straight_key_serial( KeyerState ks, int fd );
00158 extern BOOLEAN read_iambic_key_serial( KeyerState ks, int fd, KeyerLogic kl,
00159                                        REAL ticklen );
00160 
00161 //========================================================================
00162 
00163 #endif /*  */
